text: Pedro Casado Bucho (20 November 1937 – 10 January 2021) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a defender. Casado was born in Madrid. From 1956 to 1966, he played for Real Madrid and Plus Ultra from 1957 to 1960. In 1961, he made one appearance for the national team. Casado died on 10 January 2021 in Madrid, aged 83.Muere Casado, defensa del Madrid de la década de los 60 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Madrid
title: Pedro Casado
